text: Mesa is a city in Maricopa County, Arizona and part of the Phoenix-Mesa- Scottsdale Metropolitan Area. It is the 37th most populous city in the United States of America. It was settled by members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in January 1878. == Education == *CAE Global Academy Phoenix ==References== Category:1878 establishments in the United States Category:1870s establishments in Arizona Territory
title: Mesa, Arizona
